snippet: One day after Bobby Valentine said there was no way the Yankees had practiced the flip relay that Derek Jeter pulled off in the 2001 playoffs, the team practiced the same play during workouts.
abstract: New York Yankees practice the flip relay that shortstop Derek Jeter pulled off in the 2001 playoffs, just one day after Boston Red Sox manager Bobby Valentine cast aspersions on the play.
lead_paragraph: One day after Bobby Valentine said there was no way the Yankees had practiced the flip relay that Derek Jeter pulled off in the 2001 playoffs, the team practiced the same play during workouts.

headline.seo: Yankees Practice Jeter’s Famed Flip Relay
headline.main: In Relay Practice, Yankees Have an Answer for Valentine
headline.print_headline: In Relay Practice, Yankees Have an Answer for Valentine
